entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
